channel.title: Compiler problem with jdk 1.5.9 someone help?
channel.description:
OK, my problem isnt my .bat source code, its in the right directory and everything. but i get an error that reads this:
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint: deprecation for details. Press any key to continue...
now i'm fairly new to java so for all i know this could be an obvious fix, the help is appreciated. btw when i click 'edit' the compiler it looks like this:
@echo off COLOR f0 title PwnScape Client COLOR 08 title Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java COLOR f0 pause

item.title: Compiler problem with jdk 1.5.9 someone help?
item.dc:creator: @purelion6679 purelion6679
item.description:
@purelion6679 wrote:

well, i thought it was an error b/c of a problem i have with my server. I tried adding my first new shop by putting a santa claus in varrock square and when i put the code in the client.java file i dont think it was compiling, because even though the santa appeared and was walking around and everything, i couldnt trade with it! yes i setup the shop under shops.cfg and so forth. also, if anyone knows how to add a (trade with) option to an NPC to make it more of a shop-like person, please let me know (or change the name of the NPC as a matter of fact)

@echo off
